mapper.select: select * from databaselab.adminpayment where AHRName like concat('%','${keyword}','%') or Designee like concat('%','${keyword}','%') or Registrant like concat('%','${keyword}','%');
select * from databaselab.adminpayment where DesigneeTime between #{start} and #{end};
mapper.insert: insert into databaselab.adminpayment (AHRid, AHRName, Designee, DesigneeTime, Registrant, Base, Transportation, Lunch, Communication, PensionInsurance, MedicalInsurance, UnemploymentInsurance, HousingProvidentFund, Tatol, State) values (#{AHRid},#{AHRName},#{Designee},#{DesigneeTime},#{Registrant},#{Base},#{Transportation},#{Lunch},#{Communication},#{PensionInsurance},#{MedicalInsurance},#{UnemploymentInsurance},#{HousingProvidentFund},#{Tatol},#{State});
mapper.update: update databaselab.adminpayment set AHRid=#{AHRid},AHRName = #{AHRName},Designee = #{Designee},DesigneeTime=#{DesigneeTime},Registrant = #{Registrant},Base = #{Base},Transportation = #{Transportation},Lunch = #{Lunch},Communication = #{Communication},PensionInsurance = #{PensionInsurance},MedicalInsurance = #{MedicalInsurance},UnemploymentInsurance = #{UnemploymentInsurance},HousingProvidentFund = #{HousingProvidentFund},Tatol = #{Tatol},State = #{State},Suggestion = #{Suggestion} where id = #{id};
